entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
